message: Let's start with a fair split, no need to negotiate too much.
You wanted a fair split, now it's your turn to negotiate!
You can't have all the money, Bob! I'm willing to give you a slightly smaller share, but still a decent amount.
You're not giving me a very good deal, Alice!
You're being a bit greedy, Bob! I'm willing to give you a slightly smaller share, but you need to meet me in the middle.
You're really pushing it now, Alice. This is my last offer!
This is my final offer, Bob. I'm willing to give you a decent share, but I'm not backing down on the majority of the money.
